title: PokemonRareHolo
author: PokemonRareHolo
content: I got a really really super big Pokemon card collection and I’m slowly trying to part ways with it now hah. I don’t want to but it’s probably best I do. So I thought to myself what better ways to sell my collection than for different cryptocurrencies. So yea I got EVERYTHING from a first edition 1999 Chairzard Holo card all the way to the original booster boxes factory sealed . Seriously if you are a collector you should definitely get in touch . Thanks

comments.author: definevalue
comments.body: Quote from: PokemonRareHolo on November 21, 2023, 11:52:14 AMI got a really really super big Pokemon card collection and I’m slowly trying to part ways with it now hah. I don’t want to but it’s probably best I do. So I thought to myself what better ways to sell my collection than for different cryptocurrencies. So yea I got EVERYTHING from a first edition 1999 Chairzard Holo card all the way to the original booster boxes factory sealed . Seriously if you are a collector you should definitely get in touch . Thanks I like my 90s nostalgia sending you a DM with my phone # wanna see some videos lets talk.

comments.author: criptoevangelista
comments.body: This isn't the first time I've seen this type of post involving Pokémon cards. It's already getting insistent.This seems to me to be a strong indication of an attempted coup.

comments.author: guy369
comments.body: Minerjones escrow and shipping available?I’d be interested, but only if I can have peace of mind with purchase
